full_summary:
**Tender Title - Informatics Support for Web Development and Maintenance for Geo.ca**
=============================================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01020314
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000071370

**Overview:**
Natural Resources Canada is seeking multiple Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) supply arrangement holders to provide web development and maintenance support for Geo.ca. The successful suppliers will provide a range of services, including consultation and user requirements gathering, web map development, custom cartography, geospatial analysis, and data conditioning and management.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Services will be required for the categories of:
    *   Programmer/Software Developer
    *   Web Designer
    *   Web Developer
    *   Business Analyst
    *   Technical Architect
    *   Enterprise Architect
*   Security requirements: Common PS SRCL #06 applies, with a minimum corporate security requirement of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and a minimum resource security requirement of Enhanced Reliability
*   Suppliers must submit a bid for all required resource categories
*   Work is not currently being performed by a contracted resource

**Qualification Requirements:**
Suppliers must have a valid TBIPS supply arrangement in Tier 1 for the National Capital Region, with the required services in the specified categories.

**Proposal Submissions:**
Invitations to submit proposals have been extended to qualified suppliers. Proposal submissions must be received by the tender closing date of March 9, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EST). The proposal submission process will be conducted electronically, and suppliers will be notified by email. Suppliers are advised to note that the distribution of solicitation documents does not fall under the responsibility of BuyAndSell.GC.CA.

**Security Requirements:**
